name: Kruzifer Delaluz
text: These guys are fantastic. They can always get what you need. Even if it isn't in stock in Mobile, they can get it in a day from the Ryerson in Birmingham, Atlanta or New Orleans. Guys in the shop are friendly and always willing to help. This is the only company I will ever buy metal from.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Kruzifer Delaluz. Hope to see you back

no sales personal available. come back later, maybe somebody will be here by then ????
Hell of a way to do business.

name: Ron Lister
text: ZERO STARS.  These people are liars.  Plain and simple.  I will never work for this company again.  We had 13 people go out to AMNS Calvert Still mill for a 2, possible three day shutdown.  After 11 hrs. they said it was over and we would not be coming back.  We finished our task.  We were brought out by EM Contractors in Daphne, They perpetrated the lie.  They knew no one would go to Calvert al. for 11 hrs., so they right out lied to us.  And then they had the nerve to ask us to sign into the next task that would last about 30 minutes.  NA, we are good!  Yawl do it!  Do Not Answer the phone for EM Contracting in Daphne, the will screw you.  As for RJ Baggett, I will never work for you again

name: Rick Davis
text: Good job company

name: ANDRE AUSBON
text: Of all the Shelter places we looked at, these folks are the best in my opinion.  They have been specializing in building quality shelters for 25+ years.  We first made the short drive to their facility and was able to see several different styles.  The staff was very helpful and polite in pointing out all the options for door and seating placement.  They were helpful in understanding the different features on an indoor shelter vs outdoor shelter. They clearly discussed all the associated costs, delivery, etc.   They properly set your expectations on expected completion date.  We had ours delivered and installed in our Detach Garage.  We feel much more comfortable now having the shelter to protect us in time of need.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review and thank you for choosing us as your severe weather protection!! We are extremely grateful.

name: Angie Barnett
text: We just had our 4x8 foot storm shelter installed on July 22, 2021.  We cannot say enough positive things about the quality, price, and customer service of this company.  We have experienced several close calls with tornadoes in Chilton County during the past two years.  The anxiety of not having a safe place to take shelter, especially with several small grandchildren, was more than I could handle.  With this shelter, I feel such a peace of mind in knowing that we will be protected.  I researched several companies, and kept coming back to Safe-T-Shelters because of their great reviews as well as their personable customer service reps who answered MANY questions for us.  I highly recommend this company!

resp.text: Hey Angie. Thank you so much for the wonderful review. It was a pleasure working with you. We are so grateful for your support and for choosing us for your severe weather protection.

name: Josh Cross
text: After the tornado came through in 2019 we knew we had to get ourselves more prepared.  I reached out to Dustin at Safe-T-Shelter for some options.  They went above and beyond for us, they have a great product and great service too.  I highly recommend them if you want to have somewhere safe during the storms.

resp.text: Hey Josh. Thank you so much for the great review. It was a pleasure working with you and we hope our shelter will provide you and your family a lifetime of peace of mind during severe weather.

name: Hailey Gothard
text: The customer service is excellent!  They provided a great and quality product and went above and beyond!  Once it was installed they touched up places on the shelter that paint had come off during the trip down and made sure we were happy with everything.  Great product and wonderful people!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your support! We are happy to hear you are pleased with our product and service.

name: Tracey Perkins
text: Great service and so thankful for this peace of mind!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and your support! We are happy to know our shelter has brought you peace of mind during severe weather.

name: Meredith Northington
text: Professional, kind, personable, and friendly service. The men who installed our shelter were excellent, and they left no mess. They took time to explain how our shelter works and answered any questions we had. We love the experience we had with Safe-T-Shelter.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review!

name: kathryn seligman
text: Wonderful company! Quick install ... professional and polite! Iam not afraid of storms now and I don’t have to leave my house! Also best price around.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We are so glad to hear you are pleased with our product and service!!

name: Dax McDaniel
text: A simple process. They even gave my grandparents in law a referral check because they had also used them. Installation was a breeze. The delivery guys gave a full run down and extra ideas of what/ how to use it. Definitely 10/10

name: Johnston Johnston
text: Excellent company. Very responsive and very informative throughout our whole buying process all the way to instalation even after installation they've contacted us. I wouldn't do business with any other company.. you get that local business feel from these guys.. we were beyond impressed with the quality of our shelter and it exceeded our expectations.. highly recommend this company to anyone looking to protect your family from storms or needing a safe room.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review and thank you for choosing us for your severe weather protection!

text: We are so happy to have our shelter completed! Every single person we dealt with was so nice a helpful. (No matter how many times I called LOL) The crews on site were great too. I am so thankful I don't have to drive to safety every time a bad storm is brewing! We are very pleased!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! We are very thankful you chose us for your severe weather protection and are confident it will provide you safety and peace of mind for years to come.

name: Spooky 'Verb
text: Very satisfied. The installation took hardly any time at all. At last, when the alert goes out to get in our "safe space" we actually have one. Great job Safe-T-Shelter. Your customer service and installation team both rank A+! Was also nice to learn that, if need be, we could have them come and take it out (we have the 4'x5' shelter out in the garage) to install it in another house if we move. Awesome!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We hope you never need it but are confident it will bring you safety and peace of mind during severe weather.

name: Ken Rabbitt
text: I was very happy with the installation. Gary and Mark were very professional and efficient. They were careful unloading and placing the shelter into the garage. It was a tight fit, but they were able to place it right where I wanted it. It’s so nice to work with experienced installers! They were done in about 2 hours. I would recommend Safe T Shelter to anyone. Thanks.

resp.text: Thank you for the fantastic review. We are grateful you chose STS for your storm protection and we hope you never need it. We will pass your kind remarks on to our installers.

name: R. Christina McCoy
text: We are very happy with our new storm shelter. It didn’t take very long to install and the guys doing it were kind and professional. We definitely feel safer and more prepared for Alabama weather.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We are very thankful that you chose us for your severe weather protection and we hope you never need it.

name: Mrs. Hubcap
text: We ordered our storm shelter Monday and they were able to install within 2 days!  The sales people were very helpful and helped us pick out the perfect size shelter for our family. The installers came out and installed our shelter in the pouring rain. They were awesome and very knowledgeable!  We feel so much safer now!  Great people!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Layron Doyal
text: It was a pleasure to do business with Safe-T-Shelters. If I could rate them a "10", I would do so. If you live in Alabama, call them! I had my shelter installed in less than 10 days. The gentlemen that installed the shelter were professional, thorough, and quick with the task. My wife and I own a barn-dominium and had concerns with the numerous storms in northern AL. This is well worth the investment and a reasonable price. NO gimmicks, pay for the shelter once installed and you are happy. Instead of a new car you don't need, buy a shelter from these folks. My families safety has no price!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! We are thankful you chose us for your severe weather protection.

name: Gina Walker
text:
I am writing this review for my father, Ray Stowe. He contacted Safe-T-Shelters on a Tuesday and a gentleman came out on Friday to show him the best location.  After determining the location, he gave my dad a reasonable price quote.  After accepting the price, they made a date for installation, which was the following Monday.  They showed up on time and was extremely courteous and did everything that they said they would do.  My dad, Ray Stowe, said he would definitely recommend them to anyone who asks.

Thank you for installing this shelter for my parents and doing so in a timely and courteous fashion.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We hope you never need it but are thankful your family chose us!

name: The Cleaner Man
text: We have one from Safe-T-Shelter. We had it installed after we moved here from Connecticut.  Luckily we never truly tested it but I can say that it is built very well! I hope I never prove it can withstand an EF5 but I am pretty confident it should have no problem. The team that installed it was very professional and did a great job. I feel safe knowing me and my family are safer because of our shelter.  Since its above ground and in our garage, we don't have to be exposed to the storms to enter it.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and taking time from your day to leave us a review!

name: Kesha B.
text:
They do not provide a safe environment for the surrounding community.  USS storm water run off floods our property. The owners could careless because Fairfield is a predominantly black community. If this was happening and whites lived in the community, the flooding will not be a problem. The company refuses to send an engineer to access that the drain can not handle the capacity of water that flows through it. Instead, they blame it as an act of God. Sorry USS you can't blame your lack of maintenance of your storm drain on GOD. God sees what you all are doing and have done to not provide a safe environment for the black community in which your company resides. He also sees how you all have treated my mom's property like it is nothing. My mom has lost appliances, clothing, decorations, and tons of precious memories.

Everyone including the mayor has thrown rocks and hid their hands. The Lord sits high and looks low. Do the right thing USS Steel and stop destroying the property of people that live in the surrounding community! The water floods our home due to the lack of USS ability to maintain and keep their storm drain clean and free of debris.

We have been associated with Browning Enterprise from last few years. They are helping us in structural steel custom fabrication and structural shape rolling for our construction projects. They spend entirely too much time socializing about personal agendas, or any and everything except getting the steel loaded and getting the trucks underway.

name: HSV 702
text:
Outstanding Service!

We recently had a medium storm shelter installed and couldn’t be happier with our Steel Safe Shelter experience, from start to finish.  We stopped by their office and were given the pitch by one of the owners.  He was very knowledgeable, very confident in his product.  He wasn’t pushy and answered all our questions. After we shopped around, we decided to go with Steel Safe Shelters.  We stopped by, signed a contract and made a small down payment.  The following week they showed up around 9 a.m. and were completely finished by 4:30 p.m.  The work crew was super friendly and consummate professionals.  They truly knew their business.

A few tips for those of you contemplating a storm shelter:  (1)  there are some companies in this area with little experience with installing shelters so be sure and ask how long they’ve been in business, (2)  verify a company’s standing with the Huntsville Better Business Bureau, (3) ensure they are fully insured in the event they damage your home (one company we spoke to said if anything was damaged during the install, WE would have to pay for the repair!), (4) ask how much the company wants for a down payment (Steel Safe only wanted 10%), and (5) ensure the concrete is pushed under the shelter during pouring – some companies don’t use this process but Steel Safe does.

A colleague of mine recently went with another storm shelter company and was VERY unhappy with the decision.  The company took four days to install their shelter, damaged the shelter and seemed to be very disorganized.  And, they required a down payment of 50%!  So, ask lots of questions from a perspective company before making a final decision.  Steel Safe Shelters lived up to their word in every respect.

The final deciding factor for us to go with Steel Safe Shelters is that Lowes endorses them.  To be endorsed by Lowes is a big deal – they don’t put their name alongside any company unless they meet rigorous standards.

One final tip:  make sure you ask for one of their t-shirts! :  )

name: Bruce Weaver
text: Great people and service. They took control of my project and exceeded my expectations. The priice was right what I had calculated it would be as well. Great Job!!!

name: adam ledbetter
text: Great service. I highly recommend them for all your welding needs. Stainless steel, aluminum, mild steel and everything in between. Great repairs and fab work from scratch.they can even cut custom jobs on the water plasma table.

text:
I had a very good experience at Valley Repair Service on 7-2-2019. We had a lawn tractor wheel and hinge break off a cutting deck. I called this service and spoke with Ken the shop foreman and he told me they could make the repair. I drove to the shop with trailer and mower in tow. Ken welded the wheel hinge back onto the cutting deck within minutes! Great service and very nice welding work!
Thank you to Ken and Valley Repair Service!

They stayed open for him and did an amazing job fixing the problem, charged a very reasonable price ,were very professional and friendly.Couldnt ask for any better.Would definitely use again.Thanks Micheal and the guys at J and S.

name: Reggie Burns
text: Good workmanship

name: Nathan Nance
text: Great service

name: ashley robison
text: I had a good neck ball installed in my truck and they did an awesome job it is clean and looks like it was installed during manufacturing!! I love it !! Thanks j&s!!

name: Yadier Val
text: Very professional.

name: Mr. Precious
text: Nice place 😎👍 I picked up a load from here once, my appointment was @14:00pm, and I called shipping office, they said come on over we’ll load you up, arrived around 10:40am took about 30 minutes in & out, forklift driver was very kind and helpful.

name: Michael Johnston
text: It's a great place to work  lot of good people work here

name: Matt Perdue
text: Worthington steel in decatur al is located inside the nucor facility

name: Vanessa Meares
text: I work security for Nucor Steel. I am posted at the Worthington Steel gate. Gate entrance is Nucor Cold mill main gate. Park in gravel lot, cab facing south, and walk up to the guard shack.

name: FAP Logistics
text: Horrible place
